history.content:
Graduated Senior here. Never took a class dedicated to stats. I know I should self study math 110, eecs 126,127 to be prepared to learn ML, but what is a good course on an intro to stats before I study the courses above?

Also,if I finish studying these and 189, what else should I do to be ready to apply to a ML related jobs or a time least work on ML at work? I don’t want to go back to school and get a masters
history.subject: Good intro webcasted course/book to learn stats and ML linear algebra
